Text:
This is the book in question this critique is meant to address which is still worth looking into:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/6934938/Intelligence_and_How_to_Get_It_-_Why_Schools_and_Cultures_Count

I would highly recommend reading as much from all sides of the discussion over genetics and intelligence as you can. If I find anything else worthwhile I'll either link to it or try to make a torrent of it.
